name: The Stone Tide
description:
Submission for Jam Craft 7

Humanity has fallen and you are the last survivor of humanity, use the resources around you, build towers and contraptions, delay the invincible stone tide.

Luckily for you, you found a place without a generator, delay them as much as possible. Without a constant supply of energy they will fall in time, and when they fall, use their bodies to stop their brethren.
